name: Community Garden Simulator
description:
Community Garden Simulator is a relaxing journey into a community generated greenhouse. Wander through the greenhouse and see assets uploaded by other community members, or navigate to the dashboard where you can upload your own plants for others to enjoy!

Community Garden Simulator uses Aqueduct to host the greenhouse content that is dynamically streamed into the game. Anyone can access the Aqueduct dashboard to see all the plants available in the game, as well as upload new plants that are then streamed down to anyone who launches the game! Learn more here: https://docs.aqueduct.gg/

Community Garden Simulator was developed for Global Game Jam 2023
